testcase.name: Simple checkers game test
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Simple checkers game test Given start a new game by restarting ... passed in 4.371s When make your first move ... passed in 1.262s And let computer move ... passed in 0.998s When make your second move ... passed in 0.251s And let computer take your piece ... passed in 2.815s Then make sure your piece is taken ... passed in 0.276s And start a new game ... passed in 3.623s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
